category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Treat_Curr_Rev_As_Any_Rev
preference.preference_description: Sets the current revision letter for a new revision in a revision naming rule. This preference applies to CurrentRevLetter revision naming rules. Valid Values: * True - Allows the administrator creating a revision naming rule to type any letter to override the current revision letter (except the letters controlled by the TcRevisionSkipLetters LOV). * False - Prevents administrators from changing the current revision letter.
